events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product I got is completely different from what I ordered.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Sarah J. for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. I have attached photos of the product showing it clearly doesn't match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and solution. I'll send the wrong item back as soon as I get the return label.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please check and let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and the return process was smooth. Please contact us if you have any other concerns.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
